# Medicare Agency Finder - Project Setup Instructions

This is a Next.js 15 application for finding Medicare-enrolled Home Health Care Agencies.

## Project Type
- Framework: Next.js 15 with App Router
- Language: TypeScript
- Styling: TailwindCSS
- Deployment: Vercel (serverless)

## Key Features
- Interactive US map with click-to-scroll functionality
- Single-page layout with state-organized agency listings
- Automated data synchronization from CMS.gov
- Responsive data tables with essential agency information

## Setup Status
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file

- [x] Create agency data table component
